segment_text: Captain Togram was using the chamberpot when the Indomitable broke out of hyperdrive.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: As happened all too often, nausea surged through the Roxolan officer. He raised the pot and was abruptly sick into it.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: When the spasm was done, he set the thundermug down and wiped his streaming eyes with the soft, gray-brown fur of his forearm.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: "The gods curse it!" he burst out. "Why don't the shipmasters warn us when they do that?"
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Several of his troopers echoed him more pungently.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: At that moment, a runner appeared in the doorway. "We're back in normal space," the youth squeaked, before dashing on to the next chamber.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Jeers and oaths followed him: "No shit!" "Thanks for the news!" "Tell the steerers -- they might not have got the word!"
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Togram sighed and scratched his muzzle in annoyance at his own irritability. As an officer, he was supposed to set an example for his soldiers.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: He was junior enough to take such responsibilities seriously, but had had enough service to realize he should never expect too much from anyone more than a couple of notches above him. High ranks went to those with ancient blood or fresh money.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Sighing again, he stowed the chamberpot in its niche. The metal cover he slid over it did little to relieve the stench.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: After sixteen days in space, the Indomitable reeked of ordure, stale food, and staler bodies. It was no better in any other ship of the Roxolan fleet, or any other.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Travel between the stars was simply like that. Stinks and darkness were part of the price the soldiers paid to make the kingdom grow.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Togram picked up a lantern and shook it to rouse the glowmites inside. They flashed silver in alarm.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Some races, the captain knew, lit their ships with torches or candles, but glowmites used less air, even if they could only shine intermittently.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Ever the careful soldier, Togram checked his weapons while the light lasted. He always kept all four of his pistols loaded and ready to use; when landing operations began, one pair would go on his belt, the other in his boottops.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: He was more worried about his sword. The perpetually moist air aboard ship was not good for the blade.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: Sure enough, he found a spot of rust to scour away. As he polished the rapier, he wondered what the new system would be like.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: He prayed for it to have a habitable planet. The air in the Indomitable might be too foul to breathe by the time the ship could get back to the nearest Roxolan-held planet.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: That was one of the risks starfarers took. It was not a major one -- small yellow suns usually shepherded a life-bearing world or two -- but it was there.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: He wished he hadn't let himself think about it; like an aching fang, the worry, once there, would not go away. He got up from his pile of bedding to see how the steerers were doing.
scene_description: indoors, dim metallic room, glowing lantern, personal effects

segment_text: As usual with them, both Ransisc and his apprentice Olgren were complaining about the poor quality of the glass through which they trained their spyglasses.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "You ought to stop whining," Togram said, squinting in from the doorway. "At least you have light to see by."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: After seeing so long by glowmite lantern, he had to wait for his eyes to adjust to the harsh raw sunlight flooding the observation chamber before he could go in.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Olgren's ears went back in annoyance. Ransisc was older and calmer.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: He set his hand on his apprentice's arm. "If you rise to all of Togram's jibes, you'll have time for nothing else -- he's been a troublemaker since he came out of the egg. Isn't that right, Togram?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Whatever you say." Togram liked the white-muzzled senior steerer.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Unlike most of his breed, Ransisc did not act as though he believed his important job made him something special in the gods' scheme of things.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Olgren stiffened suddenly; the tip of his stumpy tail twitched. "This one's a world!" he exclaimed.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Let's see," Ransisc said. Olgren moved away from his spyglass.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: The two steerers had been examining bright stars one by one, looking for those that would show discs and prove themselves actually to be planets.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "It's a world," Ransisc said at length, "but not one for us -- those yellow, banded planets always have poisonous air, and too much of it."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Seeing Olgren's dejection, he added, "It's not a total loss -- if we look along a line from that planet to its sun, we should find others fairly soon."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Try that one," Togram said, pointing toward a ruddy star that looked brighter than most of the others he could see.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Olgren muttered something haughty about knowing his business better than any amateur, but Ransisc said sharply, "The captain has seen more worlds from space than you, sirrah. Suppose you do as he asks."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Ears drooping dejectedly, Olgren obeyed. Then his pique vanished.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "A planet with green patches!" he shouted.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Ransisc had been aiming his spyglass at a different part of the sky, but that brought him hurrying over. He shoved his apprentice aside, fiddled with the spyglass' focus, peered long at the magnified image.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Olgren was hopping from one foot to the other, his muddy brown fur puffed out with impatience to hear the verdict.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Maybe," said the senior steerer, and Olgren's face lit, but it fell again as Ransisc continued, "I don't see anything that looks like open water. If we find nothing better, I say we try it, but let's search a while longer."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "You've just made a luof very happy," Togram said. Ransisc chuckled.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: The Roxolani brought the little creatures along to test new planets' air. If a luof could breathe it in the airlock of a flyer, it would also be safe for the animal's masters.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: The steerers growled in irritation as several stars in a row stubbornly stayed mere points of light. Then Ransisc stiffened at his spyglass.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Here it is," he said softly. "This is what we want. Come here, Olgren."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Oh, my, yes," the apprentice said a moment later.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Go report it to Warmaster Slevon, and ask him if his devices have picked up any hyperdrive vibrations except for the fleet's." As Olgren hurried away, Ransisc beckoned Togram over.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "See for yourself." The captain of foot bent over the eyepiece.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Against the black of space, the world in the spyglass field looked achingly like Roxolan: deep ocean blue, covered with swirls of white cloud. A good-sized moon hung nearby.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Both were in approximately half-phase, being nearer their star than was the Indomitable.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Did you spy any land?" Togram asked. "Look near the top of the image, below the icecap," Ransisc said.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Those browns and greens aren't colors water usually takes. If we want any world in this system, you're looking at it now."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: They took turns examining the distant planet and trying to sketch its features until Olgren came back. "Well?" Togram said, though he saw the apprenice's ears were high and cheerful.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Not a hyperdrive emanation but ours in the whole system!" Olgren grinned. Ransisc and Togram both pounded him on the back, as if he were the cause of the good news and not just its bearer.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: The captain's smile was even wider than Olgren's. This was going to be an easy one, which, as a professional soldier, he thoroughly approved of.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: If no one hereabouts could build a hyperdrive, either the system had no intelligent life at all or its inhabitants were still primitives, ignorant of gunpowder, fliers, and other aspects of warfare as it was practiced among the stars.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: He rubbed his hands. He could hardly wait for landfall.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Buck Herzog was bored. After four months in space, with five and a half more staring him in the face, it was hardly surprising.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Earth was a bright star behind the Ares III, with Luna a dimmer companion; Mars glowed ahead.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "It's your exercise period, Buck," Art Snyder called. Of the five-person crew, he was probably the most officious.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "All right, Pancho," Herzog sighed. He pushed himself over to the bicycle and began pumping away, at first languigly, then harder.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: The work helped keep calcium in his bones in spite of free fall. Besides, it was something to do.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Melissa Ott was listening to the news from home. "Fernando Valenzuela died last night," she said.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Who?" Snyder was not a baseball fan. Herzog was, and a California to boot.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "I saw him at an old-timers' game once, I remember my dad and my grandfather always talking about him," he said. "How old was he, Mel?"
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Seventy-nine," she answered. "He always was too heavy," Herzog said sadly.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Jesus Christ!" Herzog blinked.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: No one on the Ares III had sounded that excited since liftoff from the American space station. Melissa was staring at the radar screen.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Freddie!" she yelled. Frederica Lindstrom, the ship's electronics expert, had just gotten out of the cramped shower space.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: She dove for the control board, still trailing a stream of water droplets. She did not bother with a towel; modesty aboard the Ares III had long since vanished.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Melissa's shout even made Claude Jonnard stick his head out of the little biology lab where he spent most of his time. "What's wrong?" he called from the hatchway.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Radar's gone to hell," Melissa told him. "What do you mean, gone to hell?" Jonnard demanded indignantly.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: He was one of those annoying people who thought quantitatively all the time, and thought everyone else did, too.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "There are about a hundred, maybe a hundred fifty, objects on the screen that have no right to be there," answered Frederica Lindstrom, who had a milder case of the same disease. "Range appears to be a couple of million kilometers."
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "They weren't there a minute ago, either," Melissa said. "I hollered when they showed up."
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: As Frederica fiddled with the radar and the computer, Herzog stayed on the exercise bike, feeling singularly useless: what good is a geologist millions of kilometers away from rocks?
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: He wouldn't even get his name in the history books -- no one remembers the crew of the third expedition to anywhere.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Frederica finished her checks. "I can't find anything wrong," she said, sounding angry at herself and the equipment both.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Time to get on the horn to Earth, Freddie," Art Snyder said. "If I'm going to land this beast, I can't have the radar telling me lies."
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Melissa was already talking into the microphone. "Houston, this is Ares III. We have a problem--"
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Even at lightspeed, there were a good many minutes of waiting. They crawled past, one by one.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Everyone jumped when the speaker crackled to life. "Ares III, this is Houston Control. Ladies and gentlemen, I don't quite know how to tell you this, but we see them too."
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: The communicator kept talking, but no one was listening to her anymore. Herzog felt his scalp tingle as his hair, in primitive reflex, tried to stand on end.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Awe filled him. He had never thought he would live to see humanity contact another race.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Call them, Mel," he said urgently. She hesitated.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "I don't know, Buck. Maybe we should let Houston handle this." "Screw Houston," he said, surprised at his own vehemence.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "By the time the bureaucrats down there figure out what to do, we'll be coming down on Mars. We're the people on the spot. Are you going to throw away the most important moment in the history of the species?"
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Melissa looked from one of her crewmates to the next. Whatever she saw in their faces must have satisfied her, for she shifted the aim to the antenna and began to speak: "This is the spacecraft Ares III, calling the unknown ships. Welcome from the people of Earth."
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: She turned off the transmitter for a moment. "How many languages do we have?"
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: The call went out in Russian, Mandarin, Japanese, French, German, Spanish, even Latin. ("Who knows the last time they may have visited?" Frederica said when Snyder gave her an odd look.)
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: If the wait for a reply from Earth had been long, this one was infinitely worse. The delay stretched far, far past the fifteen-second speed-of-light round trip.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: "Even if they don't speak any of our languages, shouldn't they say something?" Melissa demanded of the air. It did not answer, nor did the aliens.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: Then, one at a time, the strange ships began darting away sunward, toward Earth: "My God, the acceleration!" Snyder said. "Those are no rockets!"
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: He looked suddenly sheepish. "I don't suppose starships would have rockets, would they?"
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: The Ares III lay alone again in its part of space, pursuing its Hohmann orbit inexorably toward Mars. Buck Herzog wanted to cry.
scene_description: indoors, spacecraft control room, blinking lights, equipment racks

segment_text: As was their practice, the ships of the Roxolan fleet gathered above the pole of the new planet's hemisphere with the most land. Because everyone would be coming to the same spot, the doctrine made visual rendezvous easy.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Soon only four ships were unaccounted for. A scoutship hurried around to the other pole, found them, and brought them back.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Always some water-lovers every trip," Togram chuckled to the steerers as he brought them the news. He took every opportunity he could to go to their dome, not just for the sunlight but also because, unlike many soldiers, he was interested in planets for their own sake.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: With any head for figures, he might have tried to become a steerer himself. He had a decent hand with quill and paper, so Ransisc and Olgren were willing to let him spell them at the spyglass and add to the sketchmaps they were making of the world below.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Funny sort of planet," he remarked. "I've never seen one with so many forest fires or volcanoes or whatever they are on the dark side."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "I still think they're cities," Olgren said, with a defiant dance at Ransisc. "They're too big and too bright," the senior steerer said patiently; the argument, plainly, had been going on for some time.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "This is your first trip off-planet, isn't it, Olgren?" Togram asked. "Well, what if it is?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Only that you don't have enough perspective. Egelloc on Roxolan has almost a million people, and from space it's next to invisible at night. It's nowhere near as bright as those lights, either. Remember, this is a primitive planet."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "I admit it looks like there's intelligent life down there, but how could a race that hasn't even stumbled across the hyperdrive build cities ten times as great as Egelloc?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "I don't know," Olgren said sulkily. "But from what little I can see by moonlight, those lights look to be in good spots for cities -- on coasts, or along rivers, or whatever."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Ransisc sighed. "What are we going to do with him, Togram? He's so sure he knows everything, he won't listen to reason. Were you like that when you were young?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Till my clanfathers beat it out of me, anyway. No need getting all excited, though. Soon enough the flyers will go down with their luofi, and then we'll know."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: He swallowed a snort of laughter, then sobered abruptly, hoping he hadn't been as gullible as Olgren when he was young.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "I have one of the alien vessels on radar," the SR-81 pilot reported. "It's down to 50,000 meters and still descending."
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: He was at his own plane's operational ceiling, barely half as high as the ship entering atmosphere. "For God's sake, hold your fire," ground control ordered.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The command had been dinned into him before he took off, but the brass were not about to let him forget. He did not really blame them.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: One trigger-happy idiot could ruin humanity forever. "I'm beginning to get a visual image," he said, glancing at the head-up display projected in front of him.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: A moment later he added, "It's one damn funny-looking ship, I can tell you that already. Where are the wings?"
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: "We're picking up the image now too," the ground control officer said. "They must use the same principle for their in-atmosphere machines as they do for their spacecraft: some sort of antigravity that gives them both lift and drive capability."
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The alien ship kept ignoring the SR-81, just as all the aliens had ignored every terrestrial signal beamed at them. The craft continued its slow descent, while the SR-81 pilot circled below, hoping he would not have to go down to the aerial tanker to refuel.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: "One question answered," he called to the ground. "It's a warplane."
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: No craft whose purpose was peaceful would have had those glaring eyes and that snarling, fang-filled mouth painted on its belly. Some USAF ground-attack aircraft carried similar markings.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: At last the alien reached the level at which the SR-81 was loitering. The pilot called the ground again.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: "Permission to pass in front of the aircraft?" he asked. "Maybe everybody's asleep in there and I can wake'em up."
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: After a long silence, ground control gave grudging ascent. "No hostile gestures," the controller warned.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: "What do you think I'm going to do, flip him the finger?" the pilot muttered, but his radio was off. Acceleration pushed him back in his seat as he guided the SR-81 into a long, slow turn that would carry it about half a kilometer in front of the vessel from the spacefleet.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: His airplane's camera gave him a brief glimpse of the alien pilot, who was sitting behind a small, dirty windscreen.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The being from the stars saw him, too. Of that there was no doubt.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The alien jinked like a startled fawn, performing maneuvers that would have smeared the SR-81 pilot against the walls of his pressure cabin -- if his aircraft could have matched them in the first place.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: "I'm giving pursuit!" he shouted. Ground control screamed at him, but he was the man on the spot.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The surge from his afterburner made the pressure he had felt before a love pat by comparison.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: Better streamlining made his plane faster than the craft from the starships, but that did not do him much good. Every time its pilot caught sight of him, the alien ship danced away with effortless ease.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The SR-81 pilot felt like a man trying to kill a butterfly with a hatchet. To add to his frustration, his fuel warning light came on.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: In any case, his aircraft was designed for the thin atmosphere at the edge of space, not the increasingly denser air through which the alien flew. He swore, but he had to pull away.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: As his SR-81 gulped kerosene from the tanker, he could not help wondering what would have happened if he'd turned a missile loose. There were a couple of times he'd had a perfect shot.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: That was one thought he kept firmly to himself. What his superiors would do if they knew about it was too gruesome to contemplate.
scene_description: cockpit view, high altitude clouds, distant ground, heads-up display

segment_text: The troopers crowded round Togram as he came back from the officers' conclave. "What's the word, captain?" "Did the loaf live?" "What's it like down there?"
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: "The loaf lived, boys!" Togram said with a broad smile. His company raised a cheer that echoed deafeningly in the barracks room.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: "We're going down!" they whooped. Ears stood high in excitement.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: Some soldiers waved plumed hats in the fetid air. Others, of a bent more like their captain's, went over to their pallets and began seeing to their weapons.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: "How tough are they going to be, sir?" a gray-furred veteran named Ilingua asked as Togram went by. "I hear the flier pilot saw some funny things."
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: Togram's smile got wider. "By the heavens and hells, Ilingua, haven't you done this often enough to know better than pay heed to rumors you hear before planetfall?"
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: "I hope so, sir," Ilingua said, "but these are so strange I thought there might be something to them." When Togram did not answer, the trooper shook his head at his own foolishness and shook up a lantern so he could examine his dagger's edge.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: As inconspicuously as he could, the captain let out a sigh. He did not know what to believe himself, and he had listened to the pilot's report.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: How could the locals have flying machines when they did not know contragravity? Togram had heard of a race that used hot-air balloons before it discovered the better way of doing things, but no balloon could have reached the altitude the locals' flier had achieved, and no balloon could have changed direction, as the pilot had violently insisted this craft had done.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: Assume he was wrong, as he had to be. But how was one to take his account of towns as big as the ones whose possibility Rarisisc had ridiculed, of a world so populous there was precious little open space?
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: And lantern signals from other ships showed their scout pilots were reporting the same wild improbabilities. Well, in the long run it would not matter if this race was numerous as reffo at a picnic.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: There would simply be that many more subjects here for Roxolan.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: "This is a terrible waste," Billy Cox said to anyone who would listen as he slung his duffelbag over his shoulder and tramped out to the waiting truck. "We should be meeting the starpeople with open arms, not with a show of force."
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "You tell 'em, Professor," Sergeant Santos Amoros chuckled from behind him. "Me, I'd sooner stay on my butt in a nice, air-conditioned barracks than face L.A. summer smog and sun any old day."
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "Damn shame you're just a Spec-1. If you was President, you could give the orders any way you wanted, instead o' takin' 'em."
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: Cox didn't think that was very fair either. He'd been just a few units short of his M.A. in poli sci when the big buildup after the second Syrian crisis sucked him into the army.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: He had to fold his lanky length like a jackknife to get under the olive-drab canopy of the truck and down into passenger compartment. The scats were too hard and too close together.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: Jamming people into the vehicle counted for more than their comfort while they were there. Typical military thinking, Cox thought disparagingly.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: The truck filled. The big diesel rumbled to life.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: A black soldier dug out a deck of cards and bet anyone that he could turn twenty-five cards into five pat poker hands. A couple of greenhorns took him up on it.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: Cox had found out the expensive way that it was a sucker bet. The black man was grinning as he offered the deck to one of his marks to shuffle.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: Riffff! The ripple of the pasteboards was authoritative enough to make everybody in the truck turn his head.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "Where'd you learn to handle cards like that, man?" demanded the black soldier, whose name was Jim but whom everyone called Junior. "Dealing blackjack in Vegas." Riffff!
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "Hey, Junior," Cox called, "all of a sudden I want ten bucks of your action." "Up yours too, pal," Junior said, glumly watching the cards move as if they had lives of their own.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: The truck rolled northward, part of a convoy of trucks, MICV's, and light tanks that stretched for miles. An entire regiment was heading into Los Angeles, to be billeted by companies in different parts of the sprawling city.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: Cox approved of that; it made it less likely that he would personally come face-to-face with any of the aliens.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "Sandy," he said to Amoros, who was squeezed in next to him, "even if I'm wrong and the aliens aren't friendly, what the hell good will hand weapons do? It'd be like taking on an elephant with a safety pin."
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "Professor, like I told you already, they don't pay me to think, or you neither. Just as well, too. I'm gonna do what the lieutenant tells me, and you're gonna do what I tell you, and everything is gonna be fine, right?"
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: "Sure," Cox said, because Sandy, while he wasn't a bad guy, was a sergeant. All the same, the Neo-Armalite between Cox's boots seemed very futile, and his helmet and body armor as thin and gauzy as a stripper's negligee.
scene_description: indoors, truck passenger compartment, canvas canopy, hard bench seats

segment_text: The sky outside the steerers' dome began to go from black to deep blue as the Indomitable entered atmosphere. "There," Olgren said, pointing. "That's where we'll land."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Can't see much from this height,'' Togram remarked. "Let him use your spyglass, Olgren," Ransisc said. "He'll be going back to his company soon."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: Togram grunted; that was more than a comment -- it was also a hint. Even so, he was happy to peer through the eyepiece.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: The ground seemed to leap toward him. There was a moment of disorientation as he adjusted to the inverted image, which put the ocean on the wrong side of the field of view.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: But he was not interested in sightseeing. He wanted to learn what his soldiers and the rest of the troops aboard the Indomitable would have to do to carve out a beachhead and hold it against the locals.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "There's a spot that looks promising," he said. "The greenery there in the midst of the buildings in the eastern -- no, the western -- part of the city. That should give us a clear landing zone, a good campground, and a base for landing reinforcements."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Let's see what you're talking about," Ransisc said, elbowing him aside. "Hmm, yes, I see the stretch you mean. That might not be bad."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Olgren, come look at this. Can you find it again in the Warmaster's spyglass? All right then, go point it out to him. Suggest it as our setdown point."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: The apprentice hurried away. Ransisc bent over the eyepiece again.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "Hmm," he repeated. "They build tall down there, don't they?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "I thought so," Togram said. "And there's a lot of traffic on those roads. They've spent a fortune cobblestoning them all, too; I didn't see any dust kicked up."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "This should be a rich conquest," Ransisc said. Something swift, metallic, and predator-lean flashed past the observation window.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: "By the gods, they do have fliers, don't they?" Togram said. In spite of the pilots' claims, deep down he hadn't believed it until he saw it for himself.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: He noticed Ransisc's ears twitching impatiently, and realized he really had spent too much time in the observation room. He picked up his glowmite lantern and went back to his troopers.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship observation dome, bright starlight, spyglasses

segment_text: A couple of them gave him a resentful look for being away so long, but he cheered them up by passing on as much as he could about their landing site. Common soldiers loved nothing better than inside information.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: They second-guessed their superiors without it, but the game was even more fun when they had some idea of what they were talking about.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: A runner appeared in the doorway. "Captain Togram, your company will planet from airlock three."
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: "Three," Togram acknowledged, and the runner trotted off to pass orders to other ground troop leaders. The captain put his plumed hat on his head (the plume was scarlet, so his company could recognize him in combat), checked his pistols one last time, and ordered his troopers to follow him.
scene_description: indoors, cramped metallic barracks, bunk beds, weapon racks

segment_text: The reeking darkness was as oppressive in front of the inner airlock door as anywhere else aboard the Indomitable, but somehow easier to bear. Soon the doors would swing open and he would feel fresh breezes riffling his fur, taste sweet clean air, enjoy sunlight for more than a few precious units at a stretch.
scene_description: indoors, dark metallic corridor, large airlock door, warning lights

segment_text: Soon he would measure himself against these new beings in combat. He felt the slightest of jolts as the Indomtable's fliers launched themselves from the mother ship.
scene_description: indoors, dark metallic corridor, large airlock door, warning lights

segment_text: There would he no luofi aboard them this time, but musketeers to terrorize the natives with fire from above, and jars of gunpowder to be touched off and dropped. The Roxolani always strove to make as savage a first impression as they could.
scene_description: indoors, dark metallic corridor, large airlock door, warning lights

segment_text: Terror doubled their effective numbers. Another jolt came, different from the one before.
scene_description: indoors, dark metallic corridor, large airlock door, warning lights

segment_text: They were down.
scene_description: indoors, dark metallic corridor, large airlock door, warning lights

segment_text: A shadow spread across the UCLA campus. Craning his neck, Junior said.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Will you look at the size of the mother!" He had been saying that to the last five minutes, as the starship slowly descended.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Each time, Billy Cox could only nod, his mouth dry, his hands clutching the plastic grip and cool metal barrel of his rifle. The Neo-Armalite seemed totally impotent against the huge bulk floating so arrogantly downward.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: The alien flying machines around it were as minnows beside a whale, while they in turn dwarfed the USAF planes circling at a greater distance. The roar of their jets assailed the ears of the nervous troops and civilians on the ground.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: The aliens' engines were eerily silent. The starship landed in the open quad between New Royce, New Haines, New Kinsey, and New Powell Halls.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: It towered higher than any of the two-story red brick buildings, each a reconstruction of one overthrown in the earthquake of 2034. Cox heard saplings splinter under the weight of the alien craft.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: He wondered what it would have done to the big trees that had fallen five years ago along with the famous old halls.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "All right, they've landed. Let's move on up," Lieutenant Shotton ordered. He could not quite keep the wobble out of his voice, but he trotted south toward the starship.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: His platoon followed him past Dickson Art Center, past New Bunche Hall. Not so long ago, Billy Cox had walked this campus barefoot.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Now his boots thudded on concrete. The platoon deployed in front of Dodd Hall, looking west toward the spacecraft.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: A little breeze toyed with the leaves of the young, hopeful trees planted to replace the stalwarts lost to the quake.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Take as much cover as you can," Lieutenant Shotton ordered quietly. The platoon scrambled into flowerbeds, snuggled down behind thin treetrunks.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Out on Hilgard Avenue, diesels roared as armored fighting vehicles took positions with good lines of fire. It was all such a waste, Cox thought bitterly.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: The thing to do was to make friends with the aliens, not to assume automatically they were dangerous. Something, at least, was being done along those lines.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: A delegation came out of Murphy Hall and slowly walked behind a white flag from the administration building toward the starship. At the head of the delegation was the mayor of Los Angeles: the President and governor were busy elsewhere.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Billy Cox would have given anything to be part of the delegation instead of sprawled here on his belly in the grass. If only the aliens had waited until he was fifty or so, had given him a chance to get established--
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Sergeant Amoros nudged him with an elbow. "Look there, man. Something's happening--"
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Amoros was right. Several hatchways which had been shut were swinging open, allowing Earth's air to mingle with the ship's.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: The westerly breeze picked up. Cox's nose twitched.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: He could not name all the exotic odors wafting his way, but he recognized sewage and garbage when he smelled them. "God, what a stink!" he said.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "By the gods, what a stink!" Togram exclaimed. When the outer airlock doors went down, he had expected real fresh air to replace the stale, overused gases inside the Indomitable.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: This stuff smelled like smoky peat fires, or lamps whose wicks hadn't quite been extinguished. And it stung!
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: He felt the nictitating membranes flick across his eyes to protect them. "Deploy!" he ordered, leading his company forward.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: This was the tricky part. If the locals had nerve enough, they could hit the Roxolani just as the latter were coming out of their ship, and cause all sorts of trouble.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Most races without hyperdrive, though, were too overawed by the arrival of travelers from the stars to try anything like that. And if they didn't do it fast, it would be too late.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: They weren't doing it here. Togram saw a few locals, but they were keeping a respectful distance.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: He wasn't sure how many there were. Their mottled skins -- or was that clothing? -- made them hard to notice and count.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: But they were plainly warriors, both by the way they acted and by the weapons they bore. His own company went into its familiar two-line formation, the first crouching, the second standing and aiming their muskets over the heads of the troops in front.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Ah, there we go," Togram said happily. The bunch approaching behind the white banner had to be the local nobles.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: The mottling, the captain saw, was clothing, for these beings wore entirely different garments, somber except for strange, narrow neckcloths. They were taller and skinnier than Roxolani, with muzzleless faces.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Ilingua!" Togram called. The veteran trooper led the right flank squad of the company.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Sir!" "Your troops, quarter-right face. At the command, pick off the leaders there. That will demoralize the rest," Togram said, quoting standard doctrine.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Slowmatches ready!" Togram said. The Roxolani lowered the smoldering cords to the toucholes of their muskets.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Take your aim!" The guns moved, very slightly. "Fire!"
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: "Teddy bears!" Sandy Amoros exclaimed. The same thought had leaped into Cox's mind.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: The beings emerging from the spaceship were round, brown, and furry, with long noses and big ears. Teddy bears, however, did not normally carry weapons.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: They also, Cox thought, did not commonly live in a place that smelled like sewage. Of course it might have been perfume to them.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: But if it was, they and Earthpeople were going to have trouble getting along. He watched the Teddy bears as they took their positions.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Somehow their positioning did not suggest that they were forming an honor guard for the mayor and his party. Yet it did look familiar to Cox, although he could not quite figure out why.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: Then he had it. If he had been anywhere but at UCLA, he would not have made the connection.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: But he remembered a course he had taken on the rise of the European nation-states in the sixteenth century, and on the importance of the professional, disciplined armies the kings had created. Those early armies had performed evolutions like this one.
scene_description: outdoors, university quad, massive landed starship, red brick buildings, young trees

segment_text: It was a funny coincidence.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He was about to mention it to his sergeant when the world blew up.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Flames spurted from the aliens' guns.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Great gouts of smoke puffed into the sky.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Something that sounded like an angry wasp buzzed past Cox's ear.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He heard shouts and shrieks from either side.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Most of the mayor's delegation was down, some motionless, others thrashing.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: There was a crash from the starship, and another one an instant later as a roundshout smashed into the brickwork of Dodd Hall.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: A chip stung Cox in the back of the neck.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The breeze brought him the smell of fireworks, one he had not smelled for years.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Reload!" Togram yelled.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Another volley, then at 'em with the bayonet!" His troopers worked frantically, measuring powder charges and ramming round bullets home.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "So that's how they wanna play!" Amoros shouted.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Nail their hides to the wall!" The tip of his little finger had been shot away.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He did not seem to know it.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Cox's Neo-Armalite was already barking, spitting a stream of hot brass cartridges, slamming against his shoulder.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He rammed in clip after clip, playing the rifle like a hose.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: If one bullet didn't bite, the next would.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Others from the platoon were also firing.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Cox heard bursts of automatic weapons fire from different parts of the campus, too, and the deeper blasts of rocket-propelled grenades and field artillery.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Smoke not of the aliens' making began to envelop their ship and the soldiers around it.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: One or two shots came back at the platoon, and then a few more, but so few that Cox, in stunned disbelief, shouted to his sergeant, "This isn't fair!"
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Fuck 'em!" Amoros shouted back.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "They wanna throw their weight around, they take their chances. Only good thing they did was knock over the mayor.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Always did hate that old crackpot."
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The harsh tac-tac-tac did not sound like any gunfire Togram had heard.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The shots came too close together, making a horrible sheet of noise.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: And if the locals were shooting back at his troopers, where were the thick, choking clouds of gunpowder smoke over their position?
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He did not know the answer to that.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: What he did know was that his company was going down like grain before a scythe.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Here a soldier was hit by three bullets at once and fell awkwardly, as if his body could not tell in which direction to twist.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: There another had the top of his head gruesomely removed.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The volley the captain had screamed for was stillborn.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Perhaps a squad's worth of soldiers moved toward the locals, the sun glinting bravely off their long, polished bayonets.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: None of them got more than a half-sixteen of paces before falling.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Ilingua looked at Togram, horror in his eyes, his ears flat against his head.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The captain knew his were the same.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "What are they doing to us?" Ilingua howled.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Togram could only shake his head helplessly.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He dove behind a corpse, fired one of his pistols at the enemy.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: There was still a chance, he thought -- how would these demonic aliens stand up under their first air attack?
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: A flier swooped toward the locals.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Musketeers blasted away from firing ports, drew back to reload.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Take that, you whoresons!" Togram shouted.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He did not, however, raise his fist in the air.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: That, he had already learned, was dangerous.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Incoming aircraft!" Sergeant Amoros roared.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: His squad, those not already prone, flung themselves on their faces.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Cox heard shouts of pain through the combat din as men were wounded.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The Cottonmouth crew launched their shoulder-fired AA missile at the alien flying machine.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The pilot must have had reflexes like a cat's.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He sidestepped his machine in midair; no plane built on Earth could have matched that performance.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The Cottonmouth shot harmlessly past.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The flier dropped what looked like a load of crockery.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The ground jumped as the bombs exploded.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Cursing, deafened, Billy Cox stopped worrying whether the fight was fair.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: But the flier pilot had not seen the F-29 fighter on his tail.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The USAF plane released two missiles from point-blank range, less than a mile.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The infrared-seeker found no target and blew itself up, but the missile that homed on radar streaked straight toward the flier.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The explosion made Cox bury his face in the ground and clap his hands over his ears.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: So this is war, he thought: I can't see, I can barely hear, and my side is winning.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: What must it be like for the losers?
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Hope died in Togram's hearts when the first flier fell victim to the locals' aircraft.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The rest of the Indomitable's machines did not last much longer.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: They could evade, but had even less ability to hit back than the Roxolan ground forces.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: And they were hideously vulnerable when attacked in their pilots blind spots, from below or behind.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: One of the starship's cannon managed to fire again, and quickly drew a response from the traveling fortresses Togram got glimpses of as they took their positions in the streets outside this park-like area.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: When the first shell struck, the luckless captain thought for an instant that it was another gun going off aboard the Indomitable.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The sound of the explosion was nothing like the crash a solid shot made when it smacked into a target.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: A fragment of hot metal buried itself in the ground by Togram's hand.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: That made him think a cannon had blown up, but more explosions on the ship's superstructure and fountains of dirt flying up from misses showed it was just more from the locals' fiendish arsenal.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Something large and hard struck the captain in the back of the neck.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The world spiraled down into blackness.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Cease fire!" The order reached the field artillery first, then the infantry units at the very front line.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Billy Cox pushed up his cuff to look at his watch, stared in disbelief.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The whole firefight had lasted less than twenty minutes.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He looked around.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Lieutenant Shotton was getting up from behind an ornamental palm.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Let's see what we have," he said.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: His rifle still at the ready, he began to walk slowly toward the starship.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: It was hardly more than a smoking ruin.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: For that matter, neither were the buildings around it.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The damage to their predecessors had been worse in the big quake, but not much.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Alien corpses littered the lawn.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The blood splashing the bright green grass was crimson as any man's.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Cox bent to pick up a pistol.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The weapon was beautifully made, with scenes of combat carved into the grayish wood of the stock.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: But he recognized it as a single-shot piece; a smallarm obsolete for at least two centuries.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: He shook his head in wonderment.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Sergeant Amoros lifted a conical object from where it had fallen beside a dead alien.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "What the hell is this?" he demanded.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Again Cox had the feeling of being caught up in something he did not understand.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "It's a powderhorn," he said.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Like in the movies? Pioneers and all that good shit?"
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "The very same."
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Damn," Amoros said feelingly.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Cox nodded in agreement.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Along with the rest of the platoon, they moved closer to the wrecked ship.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Most of the aliens had died still in the two neat rows from which they had opened fire on the soldiers.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Here, behind another corpse, lay the body of the scarlet-plumed officer who had given the order to begin that horrifyingly uneven encounter.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Then, startling Cox, the alien moaned and stirred, just as might a human starting to come to.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Grab him; he's a live one!" Cox exclaimed.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Several men jumped on the reviving alien, who was too groggy to fight back.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Soldiers began peering into the holes torn in the starship, and even going inside.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: There they were still wary; the ship was so incredibly much bigger than any human spacecraft that there were surely survivors despite the shellacking it had taken.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: As always happens, the men did not get to enjoy such pleasures long.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The fighting had been over for only minutes when the first team of experts came thuttering in by helicopter, saw common soldiers in their private preserve, and made horrified noises.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: The experts also promptly relieved the platoon of its prisoner.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: Sergeant Amoros watched resentfully as they took the alien away.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "You must've known it would happen, Sandy," Cox consoled him.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "We do the dirty work and the brass takes over once things get cleaned up again."
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "Yeah, but wouldn't it be wonderful if just once it was the other way round?" Amoros laughed without humor.
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: "You don't need to tell me: fat friggin' chance."
scene_description: outdoors, smoking starship ruin, damaged brick buildings, littered quad lawn

segment_text: When Togram woke up on his back, he knew something was wrong.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Roxolani always slept prone.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: For a moment he wondered how he had got to where he was... too much water-of-life the night before?
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: His pounding head made that a good possibility.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Then memory came flooding back.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Those damnable locals with their sorcerous weapons!
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Had his people rallied and beaten back the enemy after all?
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He vowed to light votive lamps to Edieva, mistress of battles, for the rest of his life if that were true.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The room he was in began to register.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Nothing was familiar, from the bed he lay on to the light in the ceiling that glowed bright as sunshine and neither smoked nor flickered.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: No, he did not think the Roxolani had won their fight.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Fear settled like ice in his vitals.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He knew how his own race treated prisoners, had heard spacers' stories of even worse things among other folk.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He shuddered to think of the refined tortures a race as ferocious as his captors could invent.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He got shakily to his feet.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: By the end of the bed he found his hat, some smoked meat obviously taken from the Indomitable, and a translucent jug made of something that was neither leather nor glass nor baked clay nor metal.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Whatever it was, it was too soft and flexible to make a weapon.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The jar had water in it: not water from the Indomitable.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: That was already beginning to taste stale.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: This was cool and fresh and so pure as to have no taste whatever, water so fine he had only found its like in a couple of mountain springs.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The door opened on noiseless hinges.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: In came two of the locals.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: One was small and wore a white coat -- a female, if those chest projections were breasts.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light
