segment_text: The other was dressed in the same clothes the local warriors had worn, though those offered no camouflage here.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: That one carried what was plainly a rifle and, the gods curse him, looked extremely alert.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: To Togram's surprise, the female took charge.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The other local was merely a bodyguard.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Some spoiled princess, curious about these outsiders, the captain thought.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Well, he was happier about treating with her than meeting the local executioner.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She sat down, waved for him also to take a seat.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He tried a chair, found it uncomfortable -- too low in the back, not built for his wide rump and short legs.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He sat on the floor instead.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She set a small box on the table by the chair.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Togram pointed at it. "What's that?" he asked.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He thought she had not understood -- no blame to her for that; she had none of his language.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She was playing with the box, pushing a button here, a button there.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Then his ears went back and his hackles rose, for the box said, "What's that?" in Roxolani.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: After a moment he realized it was speaking in his own voice.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He swore and made a sign against witchcraft.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She said something, fooled with the box again.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: This time it echoed her. She pointed at it.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "'Recorder,'" she said. She paused expectantly.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: What was she waiting for, the Roxolanic name for that thing?
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "I've never seen one of those in my life, and I hope I never do again," he said.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She scratched her head.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: When she made the gadget again repeat what he had said, only the thought of the soldier with the gun kept him from flinging it against the wall.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Despite that contretemps, they did eventually make progress on the language.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Togram had picked up snatches of a good many tongues in the course of his adventurous life; that was one reason he had made captain in spite of low birth and paltry connections.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: And the female -- Togram heard her name as Hildachesta -- had a gift for them, as well as the box that never forgot.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Why did your people attack us?" she asked one day, when she had come far enough in Roxolanic to be able to frame the question.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He knew he was being interrogated, no matter how polite she sounded.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He had played that game with prisoners himself. His ears twitched in a shrug.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He had always believed in giving straight answers; that was one reason he was only a captain.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He said, "To take what you grow and make and use it for ourselves. Why would anyone want to conquer anyone else?"
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Why indeed?" she murmured, and was silent a little while; his forthright reply seemed to have closed off a line of questioning.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She tried again: "How are your people able to walk -- I mean, travel -- faster than light, when the rest of your arts are so simple?"
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: His fur bristled with indignation.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "They are not! We make gunpowder, we cast iron and smelt steel, we have spyglasses to help our steerers guide us from star to star. We are no savages huddling in caves or shooting at each other with bows and arrows."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: His speech, of course, was not that neat or simple.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He had to backtrack, to use elaborate circumlocutions, to playact to make Hildachesta understand.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She scratched her head in the gesture of puzzlement he had come to recognize.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She said, "We have known all these things you mention for hundreds of years, but we did not think anyone could walk -- damn, I keep saying that instead of 'travel' -- faster than light. How did your people learn to do that?"
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "We discovered it for ourselves," he said proudly.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "We did not have to learn it from some other starfaring race, as many folk do."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "But how did you discover it?" she persisted.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "How do I know? I'm a soldier; what do I care for such things? Who knows who invented gunpowder or found out about using bellows in a smithy to get the fire hot enough to melt iron? These things happen, that's all."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: She broke off the questions early that day.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "It's humiliating," Hilda Chester said.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "If these fool aliens had waited a few more years before they came, we likely would have blown ourselves to kingdom come without ever knowing there was more real estate around.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: Christ, from what the Roxolani say, races that scarcely know how to work iron fly starships and never think twice about it."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "Except when the starships don't get home," Charlie Ebbets answered.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: His tie was in his pocket and his collar open against Pasadena's fierce summer heat, although the Caltech Atheneum was efficiently air-conditioned.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: Along with so many other engineers and scientists, he depended on linguists like Hilda Chester for a link to the aliens.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "I don't quite understand it myself," she said.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "Apart from the hyperdrive and contragravity, the Roxolani are backward, almost primitive. And the other species out there must be the same, or someone would have overrun them long since."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: Ebbets said, "Once you see it, the drive is amazingly simple.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: The research crews say anybody could have stumbled over the principle at almost any time in our history.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: The best guess is that most races did come across it, and once they did, why, all their creative energy would naturally go into refining and improving it."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "But we missed it," Hilda said slowly, "and so our technology developed in a different way."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "That's right. That's why the Roxolani don't know anything about controlled electricity, to say nothing of atomics.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: And the thing is, as well as we can tell so far, the hyperdrive and contragravity don't have the ancillary applications the electromagnetic spectrum does.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: All they do is move things front here to there in a hurry."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "That should be enough at the moment," Hilda said.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: Ebbets nodded.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: There were almost nine billion people jammed onto the Earth, half of them hungry.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: Now, suddenly, there were places for them to go and a means to get them there.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "I think," Ebbets said musingly, "we're going to be an awful surprise to the peoples out there."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: It took Hilda a second to see what he was driving at.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "If that's a joke, it's not funny. It's been a hundred years since the last war of conquest."
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "Sure -- they've gotten too expensive and too dangerous. But what kind of fight could the Roxolani or anyone else at their level of technology put up against us?
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: The Aztecs and Incas were plenty brave. How much good did it do them against the Spaniards?"
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "I hope we've gotten smarter in the last five hundred years," Hilda said.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: All the same, she left her sandwich half-eaten.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: She found she was not hungry anymore.
scene_description: indoors, air-conditioned lounge, comfortable seating, large windows

segment_text: "Ransisc!" Togram exclaimed as the senior steerer limped into his cubicle.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Ransisc was thinner than he had been a few moons before, aboard the misnamed Indomitable.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: His fur had grown out white around several scars Togram did not remember.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: His air of amused detachment had not changed, though.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Tougher than bullets, are you, or didn't the humans think you were worth killing?"
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "The latter, I suspect. With their firepower, why should they worry about one soldier more or less?" Togram said bitterly.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "I didn't know you were still alive, either."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Through no fault of my own, I assure you," Ransisc said. "Olgren, next to me--" His voice broke off.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: It was not possible to be detached about everything.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "What are you doing here?" the captain asked.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Not that I'm not glad to see you, but you're the first Roxolan face I've set eyes on since--" It was his turn to hesitate.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Since we landed." Togram nodded in relief at the steerer's circumlocution.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Ransisc went on, "I've seen several others before you. I suspect we're being allowed to get together so the humans can listen to us talking with each other."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "How could they do that?" Togram asked, then answered his own question: "Oh, the recorders, of course."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He perforce used the English word. "Well, we'll fix that."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He dropped into Oyag, the most widely spoken language on a planet the Roxolani had conquered fifty years before.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "What's going to happen to us, Ransisc?"
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Back on Roxolan, they'll have realized something's gone wrong by now," the steerer answered in the same tongue.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: That did nothing to cheer Togram.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "There are so many ways to lose ships," he said gloomily.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "And even if the High Warmaster does send another fleet after us, it won't have any more luck than we did. These gods-accursed humans have too many war-machines."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: He paused and took a long, moody pull at a bottle of vodka.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The flavored liquors the locals brewed made him sick, but vodka he liked.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "How is it they have all these machines and we don't, or any race we know of? They must be wizards, selling their souls to the demons for knowledge."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Ransisc's nose twitched in disagreement.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "I asked one of their savants the same question. He gave me back a poem by a human named Hail or Snow or something of that sort.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: It was about someone who stood at a fork in the road and ended up taking the less-used track.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: That's what the humans did. Most races find the hyperdrive and go traveling.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The humans never did, and so their search for knowledge went in a different direction."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Didn't it!" Togram shuddered at the recollection of that brief, terrible combat.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Guns that spit dozens of bullets without reloading, cannon mounted on armored platforms that move by themselves, rockets that follow their targets by themselves...
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: And there are the things we didn't see, the ones the humans only talk about -- the bombs that can blow up a whole city, each one by itself."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "I don't know if I believe that," Ransisc said.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "I do. They sound afraid when they speak of them."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Well, maybe. But it's not just the weapons they have. It's the machines that let them see and talk to one another from far away; the machines that do their reckoning for them; their recorders and everything that has to do with them.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: From what they say of their medicine, I'm almost tempted to believe you and think they are wizards -- they actually know what causes their diseases, and how to cure or even prevent them.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: And their farming: this planet is far more crowded than any I've seen or heard of, but it grows enough for all these humans."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: Togram sadly waggled his ears.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "It seems so unfair. All that they got, just by not stumbling onto the hyperdrive."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "They have it now," Ransisc reminded him.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: "Thanks to us."
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: The Roxolani looked at each other, appalled.
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light

segment_text: They spoke together: "What have we done?"
scene_description: indoors, sparse room, single bed, bright ceiling light
